main: ^You enter a sparsely populated precinct, each person passing by with little interest. Someone spots you walk by the entrance.
^"Uh, yes, I'm looking for an Arthur West. He's been missing for a bit and I was wondering if there was a search going on?"
^"Not that I've heard of, but let me get you some papers. You can go ahead and sign in."
^She hands you a sheet of sign ins, and starts rummaging through the papers.
^Arthur's name appears more than once on the sheet. The last instance, the day before he disappeared, was scribbled out hastily.
^A loud voice eminates from behind you.
^The captain stands at his doorway. He looks at you grimly, before noticing the badge around your neck.
^He points down the hallway you came.
^"Arthur came here looking for something, investigating our buisness. I told him plenty of times, all the reports came out correct on paper."
^He shows you a report to corroborate, before snatching it away.
^"We don't know what happened to change the response on 11/13."
^"So I suggest, like to him, that you stop poking around where you don't belong.
^He scoffs and leaves you at the door.
